# OIAN

| Muscle  | Origin | Insertion | Nerve | Action |
|------|--------|-------|----------|--------|
| [Medial Pterygoid]({{< var ref-medial-pterygoid.path >}}) | {{< var ref-medial-pterygoid.origin >}} | {{< var ref-medial-pterygoid.insertion >}} | {{< var ref-medial-pterygoid.nerve >}} | {{< var ref-medial-pterygoid.action >}} |

# Origin
**SF Head:** Maxilla (tuberosity); **Deep head:** Medial surface of lateral pterygoid plate and pterygoid fossa @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Insertion
Pterygoid tuberosity on medial surface of the mandibular angle @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Innervation

[Mandibular (V~3~) divison of CN V via medial pterygoid n.]({{< var ref-cn5.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Action
**BIL:** Elevates mandible with masseter and contributes to protrusion; **UNIL:** Small grinding movements  @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

# Clinical Significance
